DESCRIPTION: Puts your "Wists" up in the market, which can then be bought from other players with "Gems"
INVALID_GEM_RATE: {{user}} You must enter a number between **3.0** & **20.0**!
GEM_RATE_LIES: {{user}} You must enter a number between **3.0** & **20.0**!
ALREADY_EXISTS:
{{author}} You already have an existing deal!
Use the command `{{prefix}}mul {{dealID}}` to remove it, before listing a new one
CONFIRM_ASK: Are you sure you want to list this deal to the market?
NOT_ENOUGH_CANCEL: You are trying to list more `Wists` than you have
SUCCESS: Your deal has been successfully listed
